Title: Decaying News
Description:
The gnolls and their use of decay magic are concerning. We need to gather as much knowledge as we can, in case the threat escalates. 

As alchemists, we are used to gathering such foul substances safely--plus, we're used to the smell. Will you lend your aid?
ObjectivesText: Gather 10 Rotting Samples from the decay gnolls of the Dragon Isles for Dothenos of the Valdrakken.
